description: Returns summaries of the customer's organizations.

nested_items.name: OrganizationSummaries
nested_items.description: The overview of owned organizations presented as a list of organization summaries.

nested_items.name: OrganizationId
nested_items.description: The identifier associated with the organization.

nested_items.name: Alias
nested_items.description: The alias associated with the organization.

nested_items.name: DefaultMailDomain
nested_items.description: The default email domain associated with the organization.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message associated with the organization. It is only present if unexpected behavior has occurred with regards to the organization. It provides insight or solutions regarding unexpected behavior.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state associated with the organization.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. The value is 'null' when there are no more results to return.
